name: Watermelon Crush
description: Watermelon sour beer with tones of hops and fruit

name: Mighty XPA
description: Simple beer that's extra pale and extra hoppy

name: Kernal IPA
description: Full bodied IPA that delivers gentle hints of tropical fruits and gives subtle pine notes

name: Hakuna Matatart
description: A crisp, tart ale that's as fresh as a lovely, spring morning, with zesty hints

name: Passionfruit sour squeeze
description: A crispy, sour ale with undertones of lemon and blueberry

name: Mango Berry Tang
description: Fruit and funky, this sour beer gives a great combination of salty and sour

name: Captain's Punch Sour Beer
description: Set your tastebuds a-tingling with this traditional sour, in perfection balance of hops and tang

name: North West Sour
description: A combination of pale, wheat and hops to create a crisp, slightly tart, and ever so delicious beer
